name: Academic Essay Template
description: Standard 5-paragraph essay structure with introduction, body paragraphs, and conclusion

sections.content: Introduction
Hook: Start with an engaging opening sentence that captures the reader's attention.
Background: Provide necessary context and background information on your topic.
Thesis Statement: Clearly state your main argument or claim that you will support throughout the essay.
Body Paragraph 1
Topic Sentence: Introduce the first main point that supports your thesis.
Evidence: Provide evidence from credible sources to support your point. [Citation needed]
Analysis: Explain how this evidence supports your thesis and why it is important.
Transition: Connect this point to the next paragraph.
Body Paragraph 2
Topic Sentence: Introduce your second main point.
Evidence: Provide additional evidence from credible sources. [Citation needed]
Analysis: Analyze how this evidence strengthens your argument.
Transition: Connect to the next paragraph.
Body Paragraph 3
Topic Sentence: Introduce your third main point or counterargument.
Evidence: Provide supporting evidence or address counterarguments. [Citation needed]
Analysis: Explain the significance and relate it back to your thesis.
Conclusion
Restate Thesis: Rephrase your thesis in light of the evidence presented.
Summary: Briefly summarize the main points you made in your body paragraphs.
Closing Thought: End with a thought-provoking statement or call to action that leaves a lasting impression.
